metadata.name: Potential CobaltStrike Process Patterns
metadata.comment: Detects potential process patterns related to Cobalt Strike beacon activity

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c whoami')) AND startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\\\temp\\\\')) OR (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\runonce.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\dllhost.exe'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c echo')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('> \\\\.\\\\pipe')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('cmd.exe /c echo')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(' > \\\\.\\\\pipe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('conhost.exe 0xffffffff -forcev1')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/c whoami')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('conhost.exe 0xffffffff -forcev1'))))

output.summary: Detects potential process patterns related to Cobalt Strike beacon activity
